ReferenceDocuments.name: What intervention was adminis
ReferenceDocuments.description: What intervention was administered to evaluate the skin response?

ReferenceDocuments.name: SROBJ
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The SROBJ may be collected, pre-printed on the CRF, or referenced from another CRF where the intervention was recorded. For example, TB Skin Test, allergy testing, study drug injection.
